{"command":"str_replace","path":"/workspace/benchmark/datasets/7-bertscore/bert_score/bert_score_goal.py","old_str":"    28	    return F_bertscore","new_str":"    28    # Normalize embeddings
    ref_embedding = torch.nn.functional.normalize(ref_embedding, p=2, dim=-1)
    hyp_embedding = torch.nn.functional.normalize(hyp_embedding, p=2, dim=-1)

    # Cosine similarity: [B, K, K]
    sim = torch.bmm(hyp_embedding, ref_embedding.transpose(1, 2))

    # Create masks for valid tokens
    ref_mask = ref_masks[:, 0, :].bool()  # [B, K]
    hyp_mask = hyp_masks[:, 0, :].bool()  # [B, K]

    # Precision: for each hyp token, max over ref tokens
    sim_p = sim.clone()
    sim_p[~hyp_mask.unsqueeze(2).expand_as(sim)] = float('-inf')
    sim_p[:, :, ~ref_mask[0]] = float('-inf')
    max_sim_p, _ = sim_p.max(dim=2)  # [B, K]
    precision = (max_sim_p * hyp_idf).sum(dim=1) / hyp_idf.sum(dim=1)

    # Recall: for each ref token, max over hyp tokens
    sim_r = sim.transpose(1, 2).clone()
    sim_r[~ref_mask.unsqueeze(2).expand_as(sim_r)] = float('-inf')
    sim_r[:, :, ~hyp_mask[0]] = float('-inf')
    max_sim_r, _ = sim_r.max(dim=2)  # [B, K]
    recall = (max_sim_r * ref_idf).sum(dim=1) / ref_idf.sum(dim=1)

    # F1
    F_bertscore = 2 * precision * recall / (precision + recall + 1e-8)
    return F_bertscore
"}

extras.new_content:
28    # Normalize embeddings
    ref_embedding = torch.nn.functional.normalize(ref_embedding, p=2, dim=-1)
    hyp_embedding = torch.nn.functional.normalize(hyp_embedding, p=2, dim=-1)

    # Cosine similarity: [B, K, K]
    sim = torch.bmm(hyp_embedding, ref_embedding.transpose(1, 2))

    # Create masks for valid tokens
    ref_mask = ref_masks[:, 0, :].bool()  # [B, K]
    hyp_mask = hyp_masks[:, 0, :].bool()  # [B, K]

    # Precision: for each hyp token, max over ref tokens
    sim_p = sim.clone()
    sim_p[~hyp_mask.unsqueeze(2).expand_as(sim)] = float('-inf')
    sim_p[:, :, ~ref_mask[0]] = float('-inf')
    max_sim_p, _ = sim_p.max(dim=2)  # [B, K]
    precision = (max_sim_p * hyp_idf).sum(dim=1) / hyp_idf.sum(dim=1)

    # Recall: for each ref token, max over hyp tokens
    sim_r = sim.transpose(1, 2).clone()
    sim_r[~ref_mask.unsqueeze(2).expand_as(sim_r)] = float('-inf')
    sim_r[:, :, ~hyp_mask[0]] = float('-inf')
    max_sim_r, _ = sim_r.max(dim=2)  # [B, K]
    recall = (max_sim_r * ref_idf).sum(dim=1) / ref_idf.sum(dim=1)

    # F1
    F_bertscore = 2 * precision * recall / (precision + recall + 1e-8)
    return F_bertscore
